column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If you're a foodie who's not afraid to sacrifice your diet for one meal
column2: this is a good place to do that.  This restaurant re-focuses food back to the art of cooking
column4: and well-balance flavors.  The bakery cranks out copious amounts of artisan breads and desserts
column5: while the kitchen uses traditional ingredients like quality bacon to spice up any dish.  Just like any place trendy
column7: there seem to be a perpetually long line and limited seating.
